text: Singer 2019 is the third season of Chinese television series Singer, a rebranded version of I Am a Singer that will air on Hunan Television. It is produced by Hong Tao, and its music director is Hong Kong senior musician Kubert Leung. It will be recorded in the Hunan Broadcasting System Radio and Television Center, Changsha, Hunan on January 4, 2019 and aired from January 11 to April 12, 2019 on Hunan Television. ==Results== First Safe Bottom Eliminated Return Performance Challenger Challenge Success Challenge Failure Breakout Success Breakout Failure Winner Runner-up Absent Singer Broadcast date (2019) Average Ranking Jan 11 Jan 18 Jan 25 Feb 1 Feb 8 Feb 15 Feb 22 Mar 1 Mar 8 Mar 15 Mar 22 Mar 29 Apr 12 1st round 2nd round 3rd round 4th round Breakout Final Round Qualifying Knockout Overall Challenge Qualifying Knockout Overall Challenge Qualifying Knockout Overall Challenge Qualifying Challenge 1st round 2nd round 1 Liu Huan 1 3 1 3 5 1 1 5 5 3 6 5 2 3 — — 1 3.08 2 Wu Tsing-fong 2 2 2 2 3 4 3 2 1 5 1 4 4 5 — — 2 3 3 Super Vocal finalists — — — — — — — 3 2 6 4 3 5 6 1 — 3 3.63 4 Yang Kun 6 1 3 1 2 7 6 6 3 4 5 1 7 1 — — 4 3.58 5 Chyi Yu 3 6 4 5 6 3 5 4 4 2 2 2 6 2 — — — 3.91 6 Polina Gagarina — — — — 1 2 2 1 6 1 3 7 3 — 2 — — 2.88 7 Gong Linna — — — — — — — — — — — — 1 7 3 — — 3.67 8 Faith Yang — — — — — — — — 7 7 7 — — — 4 — — 6 9 Chen Chusheng — — — — — — — — — — — — — 4 5 — — 4.5 10 Escape Plan 7 7 7 — — — — — — — — — — — 6 — — 6.67 11 Kristian Kostov 4 5 4 6 4 5 4 7 — — — — — — 7 — — 5.43 12 ANU — — — 4 7 6 7 — — — — — — — 8 — — 6.25 13 Zhang Xin 5 4 6 7 — — — — — — — — — — — — — 5.33 14 Angela Hui — — — — — — — — — — — 6 — — — — — 6 ==Details of competitions== ===1st round=== ====Qualifying==== ====Overall ranking==== Escape Plan was eliminated in the 1st round.
